SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.view

Class BookshelfView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.view.BookshelfView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BookshelfView extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the Bookshelf's view. The class contains a series of getters to access their personal goals, their goal tiles, their Bookshelfs, chats and a series of other class related relevant informations.
See Also:
  • Bookshelf

  • Tile

    • score

      public int score() throws Exception
      Evaluates the score of the Players considering whether if they have accomplished an objective through the given group of tiles, a CommonGoal or a PersonalGoal. If the number of tiles is below the first goal available, no points are assigned. If the number of tiles is over the last goal available, given points remain equal to the last goal points.
      Returns:
      the current score.
      Throws:
      Exception - prints a message error in case Bookshelf points have not been set.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • CommonGoal
      • PersonalGoal
